Name: Killer Gin Battle Arcade
About the game: 4 Player Killer Gin Co-op / VS Platformer! Harken back to the old-school platformers! Heavily inspired by an Arcade Classic, Killer Gin Battle Arcade is a spinoff game of the Killer Gin RPG Franchise that throws our heroes into multiplayer mayhem! Use attacks, powers, and advanced tactics to eliminate enemies or your friends! Win by collecting 5 coins or being the last man standing! One thing is for sure; skills pay the bills! - Play Couch Multiplayer or Go Solo Play with up to 4 friends or play alone! Test your skills in a variety of different modes! - PVP or Co-op Prove youâ€™re the best old-school platfomer or work together to test your team chemistry! - Robust Replay System Rewatch your victory, slow-mo, fast forward, frame by frame, completely control the action and relive your victory to the dismay of the loser! - Customize the Game Turn items, enemies, and game mechanics on or off to customize your matches! - Different Game Modes Story(still in development), Co-op, VS, VS Timer, Tag, and Bomb mode! All modes accommodate 4 players! - Professional Voice Acting brings the Characters to life! Each character has a distinct and unique personality. - The game will be frequently updated and patched We listen closely to player feedback, and we would love to hear from you. ///////////////////////////////////////////////////// ///////////////////////////////////////////////////// ///////////////////////////////////////////////////// I highly recommend the use of controllers and 3 additional friends for maximum fun!
